mapper.sql: t.ID, t.MAINID, t.DPRTCODE, t.YSWJM, t.WBWJM, t.NBWJM, t.WJDX, t.HZM, t.SM, t.CFLJ, t.YXZT, t.CZSJ, t.CZBMID, t1.username || ' ' ||t1.realname as CZRID
t.ID, t.MAINID, t.DPRTCODE, t.YSWJM, t.WBWJM, t.NBWJM, t.WJDX, t.HZM, t.SM, t.CFLJ, t.YXZT, t.CZSJ, t.CZBMID,t.CZRID
mapper.insert: insert into D_011 (ID, MAINID, DPRTCODE, YSWJM, WBWJM, NBWJM, WJDX, HZM, SM, CFLJ, YXZT, CZSJ, CZBMID,CZRID) values (#{id}, #{mainid}, #{dprtcode}, #{yswjm}, #{wbwjm}, #{nbwjm}, #{wjdx}, #{hzm}, #{sm}, #{cflj}, #{yxzt},sysdate, #{czbmid}, #{czrid})
mapper.update:
update D_011 set MAINID = #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CZSJ = sysdate, CZBMID = #{czbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CZRID = #{czrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID in
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from D_011 t left join T_USER t1 on t.czrid=t1.id
order by t.WBWJM asc,t.id
order by ${pagination.sort} ${pagination.order}

update D_011
MAINID = #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YSWJM = #{yswjm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WBWJM = #{wbwjm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NBWJM = #{nbwjm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SM = #{sm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CZRID = #{czrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update D_011 set MAINID = #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YSWJM = #{yswjm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WBWJM = #{wbwjm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NBWJM = #{nbwjm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WJDX = #{wjdx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HZM = #{hzm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SM = #{sm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFLJ = #{cflj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YXZT = #{yxzt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CZSJ = #{czsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CZBMID = #{czbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CZRID = #{czrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select , d1.id as d1id, d1.mkdm as d1mkdm, d1.mlmc as d1mlmc, d1.fmlid as d1fmlid, d1.sm as d1sm from D_011 t left join t_user t1 on t.czrid = t1.id left join d_014 d1 on t.mainid = d1.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update D_011 d1 set yxzt = 1 where exists (select 1 from d_01801 d2 where d2.manid = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and d2.wjid = d1.id)
